definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Are those the judicial appointments for the Free States?
sentences.chinese: 那些是自由州的司法任命狀麼？

sentences.english: At 16, napoleon received a commission as a second lieutenant of artillery .
sentences.chinese: 16歲的拿破崙得到了炮兵少尉的任命狀。
